home.title: FullStack Developer.
home.subTitle: Developing the future!
home.description: Hello! My name is Nicolás Schönfeld, I am a Full-Stack developer although I love doing Front-End. I am 23 years old, I live in Cruz del Eje Córdoba Argentina. I am creative and I strive to innovate or improve what exists.
